formula.text:
CASE
    WHEN ISNULL("LFA1"."VBUND") = 1 THEN 'External'
    ELSE 'Internal'
END

components.message:
Filters used:
1) High Runners: filter out non catalogue orders
2) Sheet: Filter our dummy value prices (for now: 0)

Deleted Purchase Order Items should be filtered out for this Analysis to disregard errors in processing. We assume that once the PO Item is deleted the variation in price of said item is no longer relevant and the error has been fixed.
Currency conversion is not yet enabled. Filtering on one currency or a set of currencies with a comperable conversion rate is necessary to achieve valid results.
Quantity unit conversion is not yet enabled. Filtering on one quantity unit is necessary to achieve valid results.

Transfer prices (Transactions between different divisions of the same company)  are to be disregarded in this Analysis. If the trading partner is internal, this usually suggest

Default Setting: "NULL" 
This means there is no intra-company code involved.
Clustering of suppliers based on the relative total order value.

components.text: [left][font=Proxima Nova][size=21][b]Setting up: Customize this Analysis to fit Your organization[/b][/size][/font][/left]
[left][font=Proxima Nova][size=17]Adjust the settings on the left hand side, to fit your organization and to get the most relevant and valid results:[/size][/font][/left]
[left][font=Proxima Nova][size=17]1) Deletion indicator should be excluded from the analysis to remove already fixed errors in purchase order processing.[/size][/font][/left]

[left][font=Proxima Nova][size=17]2) As Currency Conversion is not yet enabled in the currently released version of the SAP ECC - Purchase-to-Pay Connector in the App Store, different currencies cannot be compared yet. So please specify the desired currency to analyize.[/size][/font][/left]

[left][font=Proxima Nova][size=17]3) Different units to measure quantity (e.g. lbs, kg, tons, mg) can and will distort the results of this analysis. They must be specified in the settings beforehand and should be analyzed separately to get the best possible results.[/size][/font][/left]
[left][font=Proxima Nova][size=17]4) To effectively filter out transfer prices only 'external' Trading Partners should be selected for this analysis. [/size][/font][/left]
[left][font=Proxima Nova][size=21][b]Start Mining: How to use this analysis to create as much actionable insights as possible[/b][/size][/font][/left]

[left][font=Proxima Nova][size=17]1) Go to the sheet 'Actionable Insights' and select one relevant distinct material code in the OLAP-table on the left-hand side. Use one or a combination of the KPIs provided to select one critical material code. [/size][/font][/left]

[left][font=Proxima Nova][size=17]2) Move your attention to the OLAP-Table on the right hand side. It provides information on identifying better sourcing options or can be used for negotiations for existing outline agreements with suppliers.[/size][/font][/left]
[left][font=Proxima Nova][size=17]3) Jump to the Details sheet to validate your results. Errors in processing and complaince issues can also be spotted here.[/size][/font][/left]
[left][font=Proxima Nova][size=17][b] Optional: Enable currency conversion. A Beta version can be requsted: [i][u]appstore@celonis.com[/u][/i][/b][/size][/font][/left]
[left][font=Proxima Nova][size=17]If currency conversion is enabled, all purchases can be analyzed and benchmarked at once![/size][/font][/left]

variables.name: filter6
variables.value:
CASE
    WHEN ISNULL("LFA1"."VBUND") = 1 THEN 'External'
    ELSE 'Internal'
END

variables.name: filter7
variables.value:
CASE WHEN ISNULL("EKPO"."LOEKZ") = 1 THEN 'not deleted'
     WHEN "EKPO"."LOEKZ" = 'S' THEN 'locked'
     WHEN "EKPO"."LOEKZ" = 'L' THEN 'deleted'
     ELSE "EKPO"."LOEKZ"
END

components.text: [left][b][size=40][font=Proxima Nova]Quick-Start guide for value creation with Price Analytics[/font][/size][/b][/left]
